description: While Hot Apple Cider may seem like a typical drink to have during the fall season, this recipe is anything but ordinary. This cocktail includes rum and whole cloves for added flavor. The hot spiced flavors will warm you up on those chilly nights!
name: Hot Apple Cider
recipeIngredient: 1 gallon Unfiltered apple juice or apple cider

recipeInstructions.name: Pour hot apple cider into a large stockpot. Add the orange, cinnamon sticks, star anise cloves, allspice, and ginger root to the hot liquid.
recipeInstructions.text: Pour hot apple cider into a large stockpot. Add the orange, cinnamon sticks, star anise cloves, allspice, and ginger root to the hot liquid.

recipeInstructions.name: Simmer for 20 minutes on low heat with lid covered or until flavors are infused throughout.
recipeInstructions.text: Simmer for 20 minutes on low heat with lid covered or until flavors are infused throughout.

recipeInstructions.name: Stir in spiced rum before serving on mugs.
